title: #84 - Hotline Edition: How Do I Have Better Conversations on Dating Apps?
description:
It’s another edition of the Matchmaker Maria Hotline! If you want to ask Maria a question on an upcoming episode, make sure you’re following her on Instagram to know when the hotline will open up next… http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria

On this episode…

  • How do I find out if he wants to go on a second date… how do I get him to step up and ask?
  • I feel like I’ve hit a wall when talking to people on the apps, what should I do?
  • We’ve slept with each other and he hasn’t text me in a while. Help!

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
